unnormalised: Okay, so someone asked about cricket scores, right? Well, India vs. Aus, 3rd ODI, happened on 27/09/2023. India scored 281 all out, with Virat Kohli hitting 85 runs. Bumrah took 3 wickets for 48 runs. Australia chased it down in 49.2 overs.
normalised: Okay, so someone asked about cricket scores, right? Well, India versus Australia, third O-D-I, happened on twenty seventh September two thousand and twenty three. India scored two hundred and eighty one all out, with Virat Kohli hitting eighty five runs. Bumrah took three wickets for forty eight runs. Australia chased it down in forty nine point two overs.

unnormalised: Now, looking at some older matches, in the 2011 World Cup final, India beat Sri Lanka by 6 wickets. Sri Lanka made 274/6, and India finished on 277/4. Gautam Gambhir scored 97 runs – so close to a century! Dhoni finished it off with a six. The required run rate was about 5.5.
normalised: Now, looking at some older matches, in the two thousand and eleven World Cup final, India beat Sri Lanka by six wickets. Sri Lanka made two hundred and seventy four divided by six, and India finished on two hundred and seventy seven divided by four. Gautam Gambhir scored ninety seven runs – so close to a century! Dhoni finished it off with a six. The required run rate was about five point five.

unnormalised: And if you're into football, let’s talk ISL. Last season, Mumbai City FC topped the table with 46 points. Their goal difference was +27. Chhetri scored 12 goals. Usually, the top 4 teams qualify for the playoffs. The final had about 25000 spectators in attendance.
normalised: And if you're into football, let’s talk I-S-L. Last season, Mumbai City F-C topped the table with forty six points. Their goal difference was plus twenty seven. Chhetri scored twelve goals. Usually, the top four teams qualify for the playoffs. The final had about twenty five thousand spectators in attendance.
